name: Johnathon
descrition: The case feels durable and I even got a compliemnt on the design. Had the case for two and half months now and
, on the case I had before the image started fading into yellow-ish colour after a couple weeks. Love it!

name: Josh
descrition: I usually keep my phone together with my keys in my pocket nad that led to some pretty heavy scratchmarks on all of my last phone cases. This one besides a varely noticable scratch on the corner
highlighted: looks brand new after half a year
